interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sunwell Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Closure 3.5x4 Kinky Curly Human Hair Lace Closure with Baby Hair Bleached Knots Natural Color Free Part 10
Review Date: 2016/07/22
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '732840237895'}
Review Text: Ordered 3 curly bundles from another vendor and needed a closure. This closure blended great. I bleached the knots of the closure. Soft and great hair. This texture of hair requires heavy maintenance but it's amazing hair for the price.
Review Title: Love this texture.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Helene Hair Brazilian Virgin Hair Human Hair Body Wave Top Lace Closure (4"4") Part 8-20 Inch Naturl Black Bleached Knots (18 Inch)
Helene Hair
{'Brand': 'Helene Hair', 'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 5.4 x 1.5 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '889583690927'}
These closures never disappoint. I usually get the 10 or 12 inch closures but this time I got the 18 inch closure and its still beautiful. The hair is soft and luscious as always and the ends are healthy and full. I used these closure every time I make a wig I DO NOT WEAR SEW-INS only wigs. I have purchased over 15 of these closures, I love them and will continue to buy.
Great closure and great hair as ALWAYS!!
Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals
Pure Body Naturals
{'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'}
This is some great shampoo. I have tried several argan oil shampoos and this is by far the best. Great smell and leaves the hair soft before conditioning. Usually with shampoo, the hair feels dry but not with this. I even used this one time without conditioning afterwards and my hair was still soft and smelled really good.
I have tried several Argan oil shampoos and this is by far the best.
Sunwell Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Closure 3.5x4 Kinky Curly Human Hair Lace Closure with Baby Hair Bleached Knots Natural Color Free Part 10
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '732840237895'}
Ordered 3 curly bundles from another vendor and needed a closure. This closure blended great. I bleached the knots of the closure. Soft and great hair. This texture of hair requires heavy maintenance but it's amazing hair for the price.
Love this texture.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Products:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality human hair closures, particularly in body wave and curly styles. She engages exclusively in wig-making rather than sew-ins, demonstrating versatility in texture choice.

- **Brand Loyalty:** The user consistently supports a particular brand, showing high levels of satisfaction and trust. She has had recent positive experiences with a reputable shampoo brand, further indicating her commitment to quality products.

- **Product Length Preference:** While generally favoring shorter hair lengths (10-12 inches), she is open to longer options (up to 18 inches) for added versatility, always prioritizing healthy and full ends.

- **Quality Expectations:** The user expects softness, a natural appearance, and effective results from her hair care products. She particularly values healthy ends and well-performing products.

- **Reviewing Behavior:** Actively leaves enthusiastic reviews, often providing strong recommendations. Recently, she rated a curly closure highly, emphasizing its blend with other textures and overall quality. Her reviews reflect a discerning approach to product performance, indicating a proactive engagement with hair care.

- **Overall Trend:** The user's preferences underscore a commitment to quality and effective performance in hair care, with a noticeable interest in complementary products that enhance her wig-making experience and emphasize varied textures.
